{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRE54G |revision=v1 |asin= |serialnum_prefix=MGB0 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WACB-107GL |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/09/2004 |fcc_id=Q87-WRE54G |ic_id=3839A-WRE54G |type=repeater, range extender |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_vac=true |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C38D70 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=AMIC |ram1_model=A43L2616V-6 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0F:66,00:12:17 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Range Expander}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRE54G}}{{â€¢}}[http://www.linksysbycisco.com/UK/en/support/WRE54G Support page (UK)]
*OEM: [[Gemtek]] WACB-107GL v00 (WACB107GL_V00).
WRE54G v1.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''MGB0'''.
Per the FCC photos, the device does not use a barrel plug for power.
*{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRE54G_v1}}
